category: Human Rights Management Regulations/Article 18 (Human Rights Management Charter)
contents: Article 18 (Human Rights Management Charter) The Chairman proclaims the Human Rights Management Charter to ensure human dignity and value in all management activities, and the executives and employees of the Sports Association consider the Human Rights Management Charter as the code of conduct and value judgment standard for overall management activities and practice it. do. Revised 2019. 11. 7. [Moved from Article 17, previous Article 18 moved to Article 19 2019. 11. 7.]
